text:
> -I/home/colosi/dev/ldap/novell-cldap-devel-2006.02.20-1linux/include/

weird, that symbol is in a supposedly openlda-only path.  Are you building against openldap or novell?  Can you attach config.nice/config.log or anything like that?

I compile apache httpd from several time with that libs and conf line.

LDAP_OPT_X_TLS_CACERTFILE is only supposed to be used when openldap is detected, but you're choseing something that looks like novell.  Can you share your srclib/apr-util/config.log and maybe the ldap.h in your LDAP SDK?
creator: covener@gmail.com

text:
I seen and moved to an higher release

as you can see here, it compile fine! so is a trouble of apache 

about libs, I use a set of libraries from novell ! I ever used ever worked even with 2.2.17!

I was using 2003 libs! now I moved to 2010 libs
ftp://sdk.provo.novell.com/ndk/cldap/builds/linux/novell-cldap-devel-2010.10.30-1linux.tar.gz

you can download there!, owever changing libs results does not change

with 2.2.17 I'm ok but the but on previous release is still there
